entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 50 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections early this evening. Wind becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:07 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
